data.text: Goe e madamada huoloo, go dogu aloho!
Oo niha e kene hila mmaa gadoo be nia siibi
O malaungudu e hai gadoo be taula gahu mmee,
Doo uwa e labubudu ge malallali gadoo be di angulaa a David,
Oo uu e hai gadoo be nia manu ‘gazelle’,
Au gaa noho i hongo di gonduu ‘myrrh’, di gonduu lolokala,
Dogu aloho, goe e madanga huoloo,
Dagu ahina hai lodo, hanimoi gi daha mo nia gonduu Lebanon,
Dogu aloho mo dagu ahina hai lodo,
Dogu aloho mo dagu ahina hai lodo, do aloho e hagatenetene au,
Di kala o nia mee maangala laagau la gu i di gili o malaungudu,
Dogu aloho mo dagu ahina hai lodo,
deelaa di gowaa e tomo humalia ai nia laagau lligi.
nia laagau lolokala ‘saffron’, mo ‘calamus’, mo nia ‘cinnamon’,
Nia monowai e haga magalillili tadagee deelaa,
Di madangi o ngeia, ala aga!
